item.description:
Becoming a Virgin
Saturday, November 1 • 10:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m.
Suggested Donation: $35 (includes lunch)

Have you ever wished you had a chance to do your life over in terms of your sexuality? Have you reflected on the mistakes you’ve made and the pain you’ve experienced and wondered what it would be like to return to a state of innocence from which to begin again? There is a way to begin again, a way to be relieved from the burdens of past choices and mistakes, and a way to be restored to innocence. Come and learn how to become a virgin in God’s eyes and return to the experience of innocence, purity, and freedom that you seek.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
about Mother Clare:

Mother Clare is a mystic; ordained priest; Master Teacher of Christian mysticism; and co-director of a mystical Christian Order, a school with 15 Centers of Light in cities across the country. She holds a Master's Degree in Counseling Psychology, with extensive post-graduate training in Jungian Analysis, is a Certified Professional Midwife, and has enjoyed successful careers in both fields. She is the mother of four grown children, and currently lives in Dolores, Colorado, where she co-directs the effort to develop the Sophia Peace Center. She is the author of Giving Birth To God: A Woman's Path To Enlightenment.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Seminar: Becoming a Virgin
